q: director Mike Pence Connolly puts it in even more certain terms: ''Washington's loss is Indiana's gain.'' Connolly speaks as if Mike Pence 's gubernatorial run- and victory- were a fait accompli. Although Mike Pence would have been a very attractive presidential candidate, it is obvious this is the right decision for him and his family right now. He will be a great successor to Mitch Daniels , Connolly says.
